alert.note: Alert for Boise (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 17 at 6:34PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Idaho, including the following county, Boise. * WHEN...Until 930 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding along small streams. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 630 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Areas along Shafer Creek Cartwright Creek and Harris Creek east of Highway 55. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
